FuncDef: This command configures the encapsulation to be advertised with the EVPN routes for the service. The encapsulation is encoded in RFC5512-based tunnel encapsulation extended communities.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the MPLS-over-UDP encapsulation value in the RFC5512 encapsulation extended community.
Specifies the MPLS encapsulation value in the RFC5512 encapsulation extended community.

ExtraInfo: Default: send-evpn-encap mpls (in the config>service>vpls>bgp-evpn>mpls context)send-evpn-encap (in the config>service>vpls>bgp-evpn>vxlan context)
